comments.author: Tech_Dude1994
comments.body: Caroline Martin is a good one

comments.author: Kennethe92
comments.body: Not in the city center but the best physio by far is Arnaud Ominetti. He’s based in Thionville. Most of the football players here in Luxembourg work with him.

comments.author: Hellojeds
comments.body:
I really like M&B Moes in Merl. 

BTW the way it usually works is that you go to your GP and they give you a physiotherapy prescription AND a prescription for a scan and/or a referral to a specialist (but you can usually go to a specialist of your choice). From my experience a physio won't give you advice on whether you need surgery, a specialist will do that.

comments.author: Traditional_Bet_4221
comments.body: Jennifer Agyepong from cabinet de thérapie manuelle in bonnevoie helped me a lot, I strongly recommend
